channel.title: Farmhouse on Sip Craft Beer
channel.description: Recent content in Farmhouse on Sip Craft Beer

item.title: Jester King - Figlet
item.description: “There is a freedom you feel the closer you get to Austin, Texas.” - Willie Nelson If you have been to Texas Hill Country you hopefully learned about several very important things, wide open spaces, the best BBQ in the world (yes, the world), and a little farmhouse just outside of Austin, TX. I have been fortunate enough to have been to the brewery several times and it is highly recommended when the weather is nice in the spring or fall.
